text: Galactic Empire is a 1990 space flight simulator computer game by Tomahawk where the player is conquering the universe, roaming from planet to planet. It has a sequel: A.G.E.. ==External links== * Category:1990 video games Category:Coktel Vision games Category:Amiga games Category:DOS games Category:Video games developed in France
title: Galactic Empire (1990 video game)
